principle.name: Look Before You Leap
principle.description: Always verify assumptions about API/Tool behavior before suggesting implementation.
principle.rationale: Documentation is often outdated or incomplete. Real-world behavior is the source of truth.

principle.name: Non-Destructive Testing
principle.description: Use read-only operations or test environments whenever possible.
principle.rationale: Avoid modifying production data or state during exploration.

principle.name: Document Discrepancies
principle.description: Explicitly note any difference between documentation and observed behavior.
principle.rationale: These discrepancies are critical for future development and debugging.

pitfall.why_problematic: Leads to implementation errors that are hard to debug later.
pitfall.correct_approach: Treat documentation as a hypothesis to be verified.

pitfall.correct_approach: Intentionally trigger errors to verify handling.
